data.lyric:
[ti:Lemon Pepper Freestyle (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Rick Ross]
[al:Scary Hours 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lemon Pepper Freestyle (Explicit) - Drake/Rick Ross
[00:00.13]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham/William Roberts/Mathew Samuels/Robin Hannibal/Cecilie Maja
[00:00.27]Composed by：Aubrey Graham/William Roberts/Mathew Samuels/Robin Hannibal/Cecilie Maja
[00:00.41]Rick Ross：
[00:00.43]Tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[00:02.88]I pray these n***as understand how passionate the tale is
[00:05.00]To get you under my pressure
[00:08.13]Richer
[00:09.57]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[00:13.62]To get you under my pressure
[00:18.00]Yes uh
[00:18.44]Biggest you feel me
[00:19.57]M-M-M-Maybach Music
[00:20.60]Rick Ross：
[00:20.91]Godfather with a garden full of snakes
[00:23.26]Car Porsche time to give away a Wraith
[00:25.73]Bricks boy tryna turn 'em into bass
[00:28.20]Big boy I been tryin' by the Braves
[00:30.66]Court room soundin' like I'm in the opera
[00:33.21]Went and got it now these n***as wanna knock us
[00:35.84]B***hes fallin' 'cause they need a couple dollars
[00:38.17]But it ain't a problem 'cause a n***a really got it
[00:40.73]Fat boy rich n***a with a appetite
[00:43.37]Count money all night under the candlelight
[00:45.91]Spinnin' vinyl Teddy P us and Lionel
[00:48.32]Not a model but I know I been your idol
[00:50.93]Big bank sparkin' weed without a lighter
[00:53.41]On fire 'cause I'm just a different writer
[00:55.95]Practicin' social distance with all these snitch n***as
[00:58.67]Guess he jealous 'cause I had his favorite b***h with us
[01:00.85]Big bucks steppin' outta big trucks
[01:03.92]Steppin' on my feet it'll get you f**ked up
[01:06.12]Got the squad with me and all they did was gimme love
[01:08.78]Foot Locker twenty deep a n***a spend a dub
[01:11.19]G-Wagen for my b***h that girl go live it up
[01:13.80]Death row that's for these n***as I'ma hit 'em up
[01:16.00]Makaveli it's All Eyez on Me
[01:18.73]Pinkie rings it's still M-O-B
[01:20.60]M-M-M-Maybach Music
[01:22.78]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[01:24.21]To get you under my pressure
[01:30.27]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[01:34.23]To get you under my pressure
[01:41.27]Tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[01:43.21]Drake：
[01:43.71]Yeah heart just turned purple
[01:46.36]Three-sixty up front it all comes full circle
[01:49.05]Class photographs Sandy had me on my Urkel
[01:51.40]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[01:53.84]Patty Mahomes 'bout to fall short a couple hunnid
[01:56.48]Signed sealed delivered I f**ked the notary public
[01:58.72]She witnessed me sign off on some undeniable numbers
[02:01.21]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[02:03.16]Yeah make a set sailin' Croatia to get a leverage
[02:06.73]Groundskeepers cuttin' the grass and clippin' the hedges
[02:09.19]I took two mill' out the cage down in the desert
[02:11.48]Matthew Maddocks called in the pit boss double checkin'
[02:14.26]"The number's all good just pay me I'm at the Rondo"
[02:16.67]Real life the whole fam' goons like Ralo
[02:19.40]One truck in front of me one behind me to follow
[02:22.13]Lemme get a lemon pepper order please
[02:24.88]You gotta have the link before you order these
[02:27.21]Dockin' jet skis in the Florida Keys
[02:29.74]We all grateful for Weezy but no one more than me
[02:32.36]You just found a bottle with the messages
[02:34.62]These days fame is disconnected from excellence
[02:36.91]Half the time I gotta ask n***as what they profession is
[02:39.52]Ushered a generation in these is where my confessions live
[02:42.04]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[02:44.81]I did brunch with the judge we appearin' before
[02:47.40]Private villas only I don't go near a resort
[02:49.97]We want everything galore not just Lira Galore
[02:52.34]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[02:54.31]For real and my city love me like DeMar DeRozan
[02:57.27]I sent her the child support she sent me the heart emoji
[03:00.22]They all say they love me but they hardly know me
[03:02.14]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[03:04.04]Yeah dropped him off at school big day for my lil' man
[03:07.56]Recess hits daddy prolly made another M
[03:09.93]School bell rings and I'm out there to get him again
[03:12.15]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[03:14.34]Yeah teacher-parent meetings wives get googly-eyed
[03:17.86]Regardless of what they husbands do to provide
[03:20.19]Askin' if I know Beyoncé and Nicki Minaj
[03:22.47]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[03:23.81]Of course pull up to the front in the fleet of Suburbans
[03:27.95]Flooded French Immersion with the Secret Service
[03:30.64]s**t is so obvious it defeats the purpose
[03:33.04]If this is your hobby then come and meet your maker
[03:35.28]Champagne ring bells in the streets of Jamaica
[03:37.89]Started at the crib look how far this s**t'll take ya
[03:40.53]Ross sittin' on two hunnid thirty-five acres
[03:43.06]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[03:45.02]And that's facts Hamdah Mohammed like my third cousin
[03:47.80]Facts
[03:48.27]Manzoor Mohammed like my real brother
[03:50.10]Facts
[03:50.63]Dubai embrace me like a Emirati
[03:52.57]Facts
[03:53.12]All my Rolls Royces got a different body
[03:55.15]Facts
[03:55.73]Mansory kitted out with every option
[03:57.67]Facts
[03:59.14]Lemme know if that's a problem
[04:01.72]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[04:03.69]If you got a problem with me gotta walk around it
[04:05.84]Used to say I had 'fore I got it now I got it all
[04:08.22]And bein' honest I don't really wanna talk about it
[04:10.89]And if I didn't have it wouldn't wanna sulk about it
[04:15.73]I had it so long I don't even celebrate it
[04:18.35]Negative thoughts don't even enter my inner matrix
[04:20.90]'Magine me still rappin' 'bout if I never made it
[04:23.27]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[04:24.76]D**n not too many parallels left in our lives
[04:28.39]I mean my crib look bigger through my son's eyes
[04:31.03]And the squad look bigger to the young guys
[04:33.49]And my dick feel better when you drunk right
[04:36.08]Spend nighttime starin' at the sunrise
[04:38.35]And my diamonds all hittin' like tie-dye
[04:41.14]Air Canada send a n***a when I die
[04:43.59]Y'all gon' have to fly in and do your fake cry
[04:46.15]First couple rows you gon' see the real guys
[04:48.55]The ones that purchase they vehicles 'cause their trunk size
[04:51.10]The ones that look at other rappers like it's lunch time
[04:53.60]Watch on my wrist never showed me crunch time
[04:56.19]'Cause I ain't never let it come to that one time
[04:58.63]To be real man I never did one crime
[05:01.43]But none of my brothers could caption that line
[05:04.77]At all kill me that's talent God wasted
[05:08.91]Instant noodles sriracha I still taste it
[05:10.66]When mama was too tired to cook and we had the basics
[05:13.82]Instant noodles sriracha I still taste it
[05:16.38]Now it's a movie I'm back at Bellag' wasted
[05:18.77]N***as love tryna put my bag where the walls facin'
[05:21.42]Big body frames wasn't into car racin'
[05:23.82]Me and Chubbs drive by shorty heart racin'
[05:26.19]I always end up droppin' the top when it starts rainin'
[05:28.78]Livin' in the 6 eight weeks sun blazin'
[05:31.31]After that the killers just go into hibernation
[05:33.63]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[05:36.41]D**n rest in peace Dolla Bill
[05:38.80]How I get a girl and girls still wanna holla still
[05:41.60]How I'm so famous gotta live where they hide the hills
[05:44.34]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[05:46.85]Everybody that survive got survivor's guilt
[05:49.22]My label gotta prove they love me gotta wire mills
[05:51.65]My boy kitchen's done lookin' like a flour mill
[05:54.25]You n***as' faces lookin' like you drank sour milk
[05:56.89]And your albums like some mothaf**kin' fire drills
[05:59.29]It's like this s**t feels real but it's never real
[06:03.76]Yeah
[06:04.45]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[06:07.44]To get you under my pressure
[06:13.65]I been tryin' tryin' tryin' tryin'
[06:17.48]To get you under my pressure
data.trans:
[ti:Lemon Pepper Freestyle (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Rick Ross]
[al:Scary Hours 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.27]//
[00:00.41]//
[00:00.43]在努力
[00:02.88]我希望这些人能明白这故事有多浪漫
[00:05.00]让你体会我的压力
[00:08.13]更富有
[00:09.57]我一直在努力
[00:13.62]让你体会我的压力
[00:18.00]//
[00:18.44]最大的压力 你懂吗
[00:19.57]Maybach Music出品
[00:20.60]//
[00:20.91]教父的花园里 到处都是蛇（阴险小人）
[00:23.26]保时捷的汽车 是时候来一辆魅影了
[00:25.73]做街头买卖的小子 想要转业做音乐
[00:28.20]大男孩 我一直在跟着勇士队一起努力
[00:30.66]在法庭上 听起来像是我在歌剧院
[00:33.21]出人头地了 现在这些家伙想要干掉我们
[00:35.84]女人都投怀送抱 因为她们想要钞票
[00:38.17]但那不是问题 因为我真的很有钱
[00:40.73]胖小子 很有钱 胃口好
[00:43.37]在烛光下数钱 数一整夜
[00:45.91]播放Teddy P和Lionel的黑胶唱片
[00:48.32]不是什么楷模 但我知道我是你的偶像
[00:50.93]银行存了很多钱 抽烟不用打火机
[00:53.41]牛掰得很 因为我是个与众不同的作家
[00:55.95]和这些喜欢告密的家伙保持安全社交距离
[00:58.67]他应该很嫉妒 因为我把她最爱的女人抢走了
[01:00.85]揣着大大的钞票 从大大的汽车上下来
[01:03.92]要是招惹我 你会完蛋的
[01:06.12]整个帮派都跟着我 他们对我充满了爱
[01:08.78]逛逛Foot Locker 二十个人一起 我肆意挥霍
[01:11.19]给我女人买一辆奔驰大G 那姑娘过得潇洒得很
[01:13.80]这些家伙只能蹲在死囚牢房 而我会飞黄腾达
[01:16.00]就像Makaveli 所有目光投向我
[01:18.73]小指上戴的戒指 依然刻着MOB
[01:20.60]Maybach Music出品
[01:22.78]我一直在努力
[01:24.21]让你体会我的压力
[01:30.27]我一直在努力
[01:34.23]让你体会我的压力
[01:41.27]在努力
[01:43.21]//
[01:43.71]这颗心深受重伤
[01:46.36]三百六十度 轮回到原点
[01:49.05]班级照片上 Sandy让我变得就像Urkel
[01:51.40]我一直在努力
[01:53.84]Patty Mahomes可能得亏几百块钱了
[01:56.48]签字 盖章 送达 我和公证人有一腿
[01:58.72]她见证了我签下一笔大生意的时刻
[02:01.21]我一直在努力
[02:03.16]扬帆启航 去往克罗地亚 潇洒走一回
[02:06.73]场地管理员修剪草坪和树篱
[02:09.19]我白手起家 挣到了两百万
[02:11.48]Matthew Maddocks叫来了赌场经理 反复检查
[02:14.26]数目没问题 付钱给我就行 我在Rondo
[02:16.67]现实生活 身边人都是打手 就像Ralo
[02:19.40]我前面有一辆车 后面跟着一辆车
[02:22.13]请给我来一份柠檬胡椒
[02:24.88]下单之前 你得点击这个链接
[02:27.21]在佛罗里达群岛开着摩托艇
[02:29.74]我们都感激Weezy 但没人比我更感激
[02:32.36]你发现一个装纸条的瓶子
[02:34.62]现如今 有名的人不一定是出色的人
[02:36.91]很多时候 我都得问他们 他们的职业是什么
[02:39.52]引领了新一代人 这就是我忏悔的地方
[02:42.04]我一直在努力
[02:44.81]我和之前遇到过的法官吃了早午餐
[02:47.40]只住私人别墅 我不去度假村旁
[02:49.97]我们想要过得无尽奢华 不只是Lira Galore那样
[02:52.34]我一直在努力
[02:54.31]说真的 我的城市爱我 就像爱DeMar DeRozan
[02:57.27]我给她转了抚养费 她给我发了一个爱心表情
[03:00.22]他们都说他们爱我 但他们几乎不了解我
[03:02.14]我一直在努力
[03:04.04]把他送到学校门口 那是我儿子的大日子
[03:07.56]课间休息时间 老爸可能就又挣了一百万
[03:09.93]放学铃声响起 我又去接他
[03:12.15]我一直在努力
[03:14.34]家长会的时候 那些妇人都瞪大了眼睛
[03:17.86]不管她们丈夫做了什么
[03:20.19]都在问我认不认识碧昂丝和妮琪·米娜
[03:22.47]我一直在努力
[03:23.81]当然 在雪佛兰Suburban车队的最前面行驶
[03:27.95]特务机关的人挤满了法语特色学校
[03:30.64]搞得这样显眼 还有什么秘密可言
[03:33.04]如果这是你的爱好 那就来见见你的造物主吧
[03:35.28]香槟 牙买加街头的钟声
[03:37.89]从婴儿时期开始 看看这玩意儿能带你走多远
[03:40.53]Ross坐在二百三十五英亩的土地上
[03:43.06]我一直在努力
[03:45.02]这是事实 Hamdah Mohammed就像我的表亲
[03:47.80]事实
[03:48.27]Manzoor Mohammed就像我的亲兄弟
[03:50.10]事实
[03:50.63]迪拜热烈欢迎我 就像我是阿联酋人
[03:52.57]事实
[03:53.12]我所有的劳斯莱斯都是私人订制
[03:55.15]事实
[03:55.73]在曼索里改装厂 装配了各种高级配件
[03:57.67]事实
[03:59.14]如果有什么问题 告诉我一声
[04:01.72]我一直在努力
[04:03.69]如果你对我有意见 你也不要提
[04:05.84]在我发达之前 常说我会怎么样 如今我什么都有了
[04:08.22]说实话 我真的不想谈论这事情
[04:10.89]如果我没有成功 我也不会为此生闷气
[04:15.73]我早就已经发达了 我都不怎么庆贺
[04:18.35]负面思想基本上不会再出现在我心里
[04:20.90]想象一下 我依然在唱 如果我没成功怎么办
[04:23.27]我一直在努力
[04:24.76]我们的生活没有多少相同之处
[04:28.39]我是说 我的房子在我儿子眼中 看起来更大
[04:31.03]对年轻人来说 我的帮派也更强大
[04:33.49]你喝醉的时候 感觉我的那地方也更大 对不对
[04:36.08]在夜晚凝望着日出
[04:38.35]我的钻石都闪亮无比 就像扎染
[04:41.14]当我死去时 加拿大航空送我回家
[04:43.59]你们都会跑到我的遗体前 虚情假意哭一场
[04:46.15]站在前几排的 都是真诚的哥们
[04:48.55]有些人买新车 因为旧车已经容不下他们
[04:51.10]有些人看着别的说唱歌手 好像到了午餐时间
[04:53.60]我手腕上的表从未显示过关键时刻
[04:56.19]因为我从来不让自己遇到危险时刻
[04:58.63]说真的 朋友 我从来没有犯过罪
[05:01.43]但我的兄弟个个都是不法之徒
[05:04.77]要是杀掉我 那简直就是浪费人才
[05:08.91]方便面配是拉差辣椒酱 我依然记得那滋味
[05:10.66]那时候妈妈累得做不了饭 我们过得很悲惨
[05:13.82]方便面配是拉差辣椒酱 我依然记得那滋味
[05:16.38]如今就像电影场景 我回到了百乐宫 酩酊大醉
[05:18.77]有些人想要把我逼上绝路
[05:21.42]大大的汽车 我不喜欢赛车
[05:23.82]我和Chubbs开车经过 姑娘心跳加速
[05:26.19]每当下雨的时候 我都把车顶篷给掀开
[05:28.78]住在多伦多 八个星期 艳阳高照
[05:31.31]在那之后 杀手们就进入冬眠状态
[05:33.63]我一直在努力
[05:36.41]安息吧 Dolla Bill
[05:38.80]我明明有女友了 为何别的姑娘还要来搭讪
[05:41.60]我怎么这么出名 非得住在山里躲起来
[05:44.34]我一直在努力
[05:46.85]每个幸存下来的人都有幸存者的负罪感
[05:49.22]我的公司得证明他们爱我 得给我转款几百万
[05:51.65]我的生产车间弄好了 看起来就像面粉厂
[05:54.25]你们这些家伙的表情 看起来好像喝了变质牛奶
[05:56.89]你们的专辑就像闹着玩一样
[05:59.29]感觉这是真的 但其实不是真的
[06:03.76]//
[06:04.45]我一直在努力
[06:07.44]让你体会我的压力
[06:13.65]我一直在努力
[06:17.48]让你体会我的压力
